title: Draped Evening Gown
description: Floor-length draped silhouette with a sweetheart neckline and ruffled skirt. Ideal for galas and high-end events.

title: Ankara Blazer Suit
description: Structured Ankara blazer paired with wide-leg trousers. Power dressing meets heritage craft.

title: Bridal Lace Ball Gown
description: Classic bridal ball gown in delicate French lace with cathedral train and hand-sewn beading.

title: Senator Agbada Set
description: Full three-piece agbada in premium aso-oke or damask. Embroidered accents on the chest and cuffs.

title: Mermaid Prom Gown
description: Body-hugging mermaid silhouette with a dramatic flared hem. Sequin or satin fabric available.

title: Cocktail Wrap Dress
description: Elegant wrap-style cocktail dress with V-neckline and flutter sleeves. Perfect for dinner events.

title: Kaftan Two-Piece
description: Relaxed flowing kaftan blouse with matching wide-leg trousers in printed cotton or chiffon.

title: Corset Ball Gown
description: Structured corset bodice with a voluminous ball gown skirt. Statement piece for weddings and formal events.
